comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Hey Frenz, No boxing for me today... Boulder or otherwise. I've discovered that my bike has been shimmying like Fannie Fox (The Tidal Basin Bombshell; remember?) because the sidewalls of my rear tire have rotted through and the inner tube is herniating through the gaps. Makes for an amusing shape and a bumpy ride. I'm scared to take it over, say, 15 mph in its current state. So I'm going to nurse the old beater over to the Sanitas trailhead and run the South Ridge today. I'll try to hit Performance tonight and grab a new tire. Have fun boxing. If any of you want to pull a mutiny and join me, I'll cruise by Humanities at 12:05 - ish.

comments.author: Rob
comments.body: So sorry, Steve and faithful 'Frenz, I have no fancy Lycra shorts to ride in today (and I'm not borrowing anyone's, that's simply gross) so I won't be joining you on the ride I actually asked for. Oh well. Enjoy the spin around the flats. Dave, I'll see you at Humanities, and follow you to Sanitas for a quick hills workout. RL

comments.author: Greg
comments.body: Maybe it's just me, but I'm not as concerned about the location of the Frenzy HQ as I am about what it's author has been smoking.

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Give an English major a computer and...
